abstract.p: David Hayden letter holds modern population genetics demonstrates absurdity of racial prejudice

block.p: Modern population genetics is doing a delightful job of demonstrating the absurdity of racial prejudice.

Since it turns out that all humans are descended from a small number of African ancestors in our recent evolutionary past, believing in profound differences between the races is as ridiculous as believing in a flat earth.
Modern population genetics is doing a delightful job of demonstrating the absurdity of racial prejudice.

Since it turns out that all humans are descended from a small number of African ancestors in our recent evolutionary past, believing in profound differences between the races is as ridiculous as believing in a flat earth.
Since science has conclusively demonstrated that we are all closely related, the gruesome history of racially motivated violence is revealed for what is has always been: hysterical self-destruction.
It also reaffirms the truth of the ancient injunction to ''love thy neighbor as thyself'' -- it turns out to be literally accurate, give or take a modest number of genes.
